quizInfo.Subject: Professional Issues in Information Systems and Technology
quizInfo.Title: Prelims Short Reviewer

quizData.question: What is technology?
quizData.answer: This refers to methods, systems, and devices which are the result of scientific knowledge being used for practical purposes.
choices: This integrated elements that gather, process, save, and disseminate information to support an organization's decision-making and management.
It is a collection of indisputable raw facts.
It a set of commands that instruct the hardware what to do.
This refers to methods, systems, and devices which are the result of scientific knowledge being used for practical purposes.

quizData.question: It is the science of allowing information technologies to simulate human intelligence
These are integrated elements that gather, process, save, and disseminate information to support an organization's decision-making and management.
Application Software allows users to accomplish tasks such as document creation and data encoding. (TR or FL)
It is the current term referring to the phenomenon of a knowledge society emerging with the growth of knowledge workers.
It can produce detailed and specified information to help manage a company
MICROSOFT TEAMS is the business-oriented version of Google's Hangouts platform is suitable for businesses of all sizes. (TR or FL)
MIS are designed to be interactive decision aid that applies models to manipulate data. (TR or FL)
In FIFTH ERA more departments were beginning to benefit from the technology. (TR or FL)
DSS systematically processes customer transactions to generate a considerable amount of data. (TR or FL)
In the FOURTH ERA of information systems rich information access was offered to business enterprises. (TR or FL)
Focusing in the PROCESS to gain an advantage over their competitors should focus highly on this aspect of their information systems. (TR or FL)
Focusing on the people involved in information systems is essential. (TR or FL)
Supermarket retailers for optimizing supply chains and recording purchases is an application of the traditional application of IS. (TR or FL)
A scanner contains a microprocessor chip or a magnetic stripe. (TR or FL)
A MONITOR can be in color, black, and white or monochrome (TR or FL)
The fourth era of information systems became widely distributed to employees who needed them. (TR or FL)
